input.value: Analyst, CSP, Database, Development, Excel, Genetic, Management, MS Office, Oracle, PowerPoint, QA, QA Testing, Research, SAS, SQL, Teradata, Testing
IT Data Analyst, UHC Clinical Business Enablement - Telecommute

div.div: Analyst, CSP, Database, Development, Excel, Genetic, Management, MS Office, Oracle, PowerPoint, QA, QA Testing, Research, SAS, SQL, Teradata, Testing

div.br:
UnitedHealth Group is a company that's on the rise. We're expanding in multiple directions, across borders and, most of all, in the way we think. Here, innovation isn't about another gadget, it's about transforming the health care industry. Ready to make a difference? Make yourself at home with us and start doing your life's best work.(sm)
Primary Responsibilities:
Working in a small clinical analytics-oriented team and in a dynamic rapid prototyping environment, perform data analytics
This includes and is not limited to:
Gathering requirements
Defining data needs
Delivering data and associated findings for solutions
Incorporate operational understanding of how the data is created as part of the solution-ing process
Ensure complete and quality artifacts that can be consumed in the downstream development processes
Apply critical thinking and research skills to interpret data for recommendations of usage and creation of interface requirements
Required Experience:
5+ years of experience in healthcare data analytics
Experience with eligibility, claims and clinical data
Inquisitive mind and the ability to questions experts and provide input to best source alternatives
Proven track record of determining data remediation options
Undergraduate degree in applicable area of expertise or equivalent experience (Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics)
Knowledge of SQL, Teradata, SAS, Oracle
Working knowledge of any of the following internal systems: ICUE, CareOne, V360, NDB, CDB, TOPS, COSMOS, CSP Facets, or Linx
Proficiency with MS Office including Word, PowerPoint, Visio and Excel
Experience writing technical documentation
Preferred Experience:
Broad understanding of all health plan operational processes and systems
Data Profiling
User Acceptance Testing and/or QA testing experience
Knowledge of UHG data across (E&I, M&R and C&S)
Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
Knowledge of relational databases, database structures
Careers with UnitedHealthcare. Let's talk about opportunity. Start with a Fortune 6 organization that's serving more than 85 million people already and building the industry's singular reputation for bold ideas and impeccable execution. Now, add your energy, your passion for excellence, your near-obsession with driving change for the better. Get the picture? UnitedHealthcare is serving employers and individuals, states and communities, military families and veterans where ever they're found across the globe. We bring them the resources of an industry leader and a commitment to improve their lives that's second to none. This is no small opportunity. It's where you can do your life's best work.(sm)
Diversity creates a healthier atmosphere: UnitedHealth Group is an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.
UnitedHealth Group is a drug-free workplace. Candidates are required to pass a drug test before beginning employment.
Job Keywords: healthcare data analytics, clinical data, ICUE, CareOne, V360, NDB, CDB, TOPS, COSMOS, CSP Facets, Linx, Minnetonka, MN, telecommute, remote, work from home
Job Title: IT Data Analyst, UHC Clinical Business Enablement - Telecommute
Shift: Day Job
Travel: No
Business: Clin Business Enablement/A&R
Family: Information Technology
Telecommuter Position: Yes
Job Level: Individual Contributor
Overtime Status: Exempt
City: Minnetonka
State: MN
Country: United States
Department: Clinical Business Enablement

div.div: We have modest goals: Improve the lives of others. Change the landscape of health care forever. Leave the world a better place than we found it. Such aspirations tend to attract a certain type of person. Crazy talented. Compassionate. Driven. To these individuals, we offer the global reach, resources and can-do culture of a Fortune 14 company. We provide an environment where youâ€™re empowered to be your best. We encourage you to take risks and in return, offer a world of rewards and benefits for performance. Exceeding your limits is an exceptional start to your life's best work.(SM) Just like you, we are driven by a set of fundamental principles that are guiding our way forward. Our values of integrity, compassion, relationships, innovation, and performance serve as a foundation to transform health care. Are you in? Learn more about your future at UnitedHealth Group at http://careers.unitedhealthgroup.com
